Literature.Title: Stereochemical effects on the aggregation and biological properties of the fibril-forming peptide [KIGAKI]3 in membranes.
Literature.Author: Wadhwani P, Reichert J, Strandberg E, Bürck J, Misiewicz J, Afonin S, Heidenreich N, Fanghänel S, Mykhailiuk PK, Komarov IV, Ulrich AS

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:17% Hemolysis=7.5 µM,Human erythrocytes:38% Hemolysis=60 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus epidermidis DSM 1798(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus DSM 1104(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa DSM 1117(MIC=64µg/ml),Escherichia coli DSM 1103(MIC=16µg/ml)
